title: How to undue stress?
body:
So my mate, who left his uni assignment to the last minute is frantically typing it up and I QUOTE, he then said about 2000 words deep. "I should play some solo q to under some stress, yay!!!" 

#Quoteofseason5

replies.body: video games don't cause normal people stress. and your friends honestly sounds like one of the most normal people out there.

It doesn't actually sound that bad of an idea. Except for me, when I'm doing a last minute uni assignment, it's within like 2 hours of the deadline, so a Solo Q game usually is out of the question, so I play a game of Hearthstone in the middle instead. Hahahah
Define "last minute". For me it's with-in 3 hours of the deadline, anytime before that I can get a soloq game or 3 in.
